paymentData.paymentGroup.title: Debit
Upon completion of the purchase, you will be redirected to your bank for payment via debit. After that, your purchase will be confirmed.
Rest assured. We offer the guarantee of a certified environment.
Just authorize payment via Internet Banking and have your order released.
No registration required and no storage of your financial data.
If you have any questions, write to falecom@safetypay.com
